game_description: Monke Chase is a game where you are a chimpanzee and you use your hands to move around explore many different places enable cosmetics and can jump on a trampoline go down a waterslide and many different things

review_4: This game was some of the most fun ever. I was the first of everyone that played that learned how to escape the map and explore a bit more. The developer blocked off all ways to get out of the map but he put stuff outside the map meaning he wanted people to find it. In 1 day of the game being out the community discovered how to fly. Using sand blocks and your head you could fly around. He took that out too. These things made the game so much more fun and yet they were taken away. I will not stand for this.
